sentences.sContent: the widespread use of chemicals in agriculture
sentences.sCn: 化学品在农业中的广泛使用

sentences.sContent: ...gender bias is widespread in the sciences...
...but the researchers arguethat it challenges a widespread characteristic of the economy: work organized by clock time...

synos.tran: 普遍的，广泛的；分布广的

remMethod.val: wide(宽广的) ＋ spread(传播， 分布) → 分布广的

trans.tranOther: existing or happening in many places or situations, or among many people
